FuncDef: The display ftp-client command displays the current configuration of FTP client.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The configuration contains source IP address of IPv4 and IPv6 configuration, source interface of the device that functions as an FTP client.
After setting the source IP address of an FTP client, you can run the display ftp-client command to view the configuration. If ftp client-source is not specified, the source IP address of FTP client is 0.0.0.0 by default.
